Activity: Wake up, quick review of today's schedule.
Log in to the system, check emails and internal communication channels.
Begin researching macroeconomic indicators as a potential data source. Identify relevant indicators and their availability.
Explore APIs and data vendors that provide access to macroeconomic data. Evaluate the data quality and cost.
Implement data cleaning procedures for the macroeconomic data. Handle different data frequencies and time zones.
Lunch break, catch up on industry news.
Develop a function to merge the cleaned stock price data with the cleaned macroeconomic data based on timestamps. Handle missing data appropriately.
Test the merging function on a sample dataset. Validate that the data is correctly aligned and that missing values are handled properly.
Refine the data merging function based on the testing results. Incorporate error handling and logging.
Document the data merging function, including input requirements, output format, and any assumptions made.
